pushscope

Operation

Push an object onto the scope stack.

Format

pushscope

Forms

pushscope = 48 (0x30)

Stack

..., value => ...

Description

Pop value off of the stack. Push value onto the scope stack.

Runtime exceptions

A TypeError is thrown if value is null or undefined.

Notes

None.
